languages.text: Прикрыв глаза, Ирлиэт стискивает камень душ на груди и закрывает глаза. Придя в себя, эльдарка заговаривает не сразу — с нотками печали в голосе, тщательно подбирая слова, она признает, что элантах сделал{mf||а} все возможное, чтобы спасти ее собратьев... но именно мон-кай повинны в гибели эльдарского судна. Опечаленная болью и ненавистью, что принесли ее роду люди, Ирлиэт тихо покидает мостик.

Shielding her eyes, Yrliet closes them and clutches the spirit stone at her breast. Coming to, the Aeldari does not speak for a time. With notes of sadness in her voice, carefully picking her words, she concedes that the elantach did all they could to save her kin... And yet it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for the loss of the Aeldari voidship. Saddened by the pain and hatred that humans have wrought upon her kind, Yrliet quietly leaves the bridge.

Придя в себя, эльдарка заговаривает не сразу — с нотками печали в голосе, тщательно подбирая слова, она признает, что элантах сделал{mf||а} все возможное, чтобы спасти ее собратьев... но именно мон-кай повинны в гибели эльдарского судна. traits.locale_text: Shielding her eyes, Yrliet clutches the spirit stone at her breast and closes her eyes. Coming to, the Aeldari does not speak for a time. With notes of sadness in her voice, carefully picking her words, she concedes that the elantach did all they could to save her kin... but it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for the loss of the Aeldari voidship. Saddened by the pain and hatred that humans brought her kind, Yrliet quietly leaves the bridge.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特捂住了眼睛，随后紧紧地闭上了眼，手紧紧地握着胸口的灵魂石。即使回过神之后，她仍沉默了好一会儿，才满怀悲伤、小心翼翼地开口，承认外界人已经尽其所能地拯救她的亲族……但即便如此，猴子仍要为艾达灵族虚空舰的陨落负责。人类对伊莉耶特的族人造成的痛苦和仇恨令她十分难过，她悄然离开了舰桥。
languages.original_text: Shielding her eyes, Yrliet closes them and clutches the spirit stone at her breast. Coming to, the Aeldari does not speak for a time. With notes of sadness in her voice, carefully picking her words, she concedes that the elantach did all they could to save her kin... And yet it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for the loss of the Aeldari voidship. Saddened by the pain and hatred that humans have wrought upon her kind, Yrliet quietly leaves the bridge.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特捂住了眼睛，随后紧紧地闭上了眼，手紧紧地握着胸口的灵魂石。即使回过神之后，她仍沉默了好一会儿，才满怀悲伤、小心翼翼地开口，承认外界人已经尽其所能地拯救她的亲族……但即便如此，猴子仍要为艾达灵族虚空舰的陨落负责。人类对伊莉耶特的族人造成的痛苦和仇恨令她十分难过，她悄然离开了舰桥。

languages.text: ユリエットは目を守りながら閉じ、胸の魂縛石を握りしめた。気がついたアエルダリはしばらく言葉を発しなかった。悲しみを滲ませ、慎重に言葉を選びながら、彼女はエランタが彼女のキンを救うために尽力したことを認めた…アエルダリのヴォイドシップを失った責任は、モン＝ケイにある。人間が自分の種族にもたらした苦痛と憎しみに心を痛めながら、ユリエットは静かにブリッジを後にした。
languages.original_text: Shielding her eyes, Yrliet closes them and clutches the spirit stone at her breast. Coming to, the Aeldari does not speak for a time. With notes of sadness in her voice, carefully picking her words, she concedes that the elantach did all they could to save her kin... And yet it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for the loss of the Aeldari voidship. Saddened by the pain and hatred that humans have wrought upon her kind, Yrliet quietly leaves the bridge.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットは目を守りながら閉じ、胸の魂縛石を握りしめた。気がついたアエルダリはしばらく言葉を発しなかった。悲しみを滲ませ、慎重に言葉を選びながら、彼女はエランタが彼女のキンを救うために尽力したことを認めた…アエルダリのヴォイドシップを失った責任は、モン＝ケイにある。人間が自分の種族にもたらした苦痛と憎しみに心を痛めながら、ユリエットは静かにブリッジを後にした。

languages.text: Protegiéndose los ojos, Yrliet los cierra y aprieta la joya espiritual contra su pecho. Al volver en sí, la Aeldari no habla durante un rato. Con notas de tristeza en su voz, escogiendo cuidadosamente sus palabras, admite que {mf|el|la} elantach ha hecho cuanto estaba en su mano para salvar a los suyos... Sin embargo, son los mon-keigh los responsables de la pérdida de la nave del vacío Aeldari. Entristecida por el dolor y el odio que los humanos han causado a los suyos, Yrliet abandona el puente en silencio.
languages.original_text: Shielding her eyes, Yrliet closes them and clutches the spirit stone at her breast. Coming to, the Aeldari does not speak for a time. With notes of sadness in her voice, carefully picking her words, she concedes that the elantach did all they could to save her kin... And yet it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for the loss of the Aeldari voidship. Saddened by the pain and hatred that humans have wrought upon her kind, Yrliet quietly leaves the bridge.

Con notas de tristeza en su voz, escogiendo cuidadosamente sus palabras, admite que {mf|el|la} elantach ha hecho cuanto estaba en su mano para salvar a los suyos... Sin embargo, son los mon-keigh los responsables de la pérdida de la nave del vacío Aeldari. Entristecida por el dolor y el odio que los humanos han causado a los suyos, Yrliet abandona el puente en silencio.

languages.text: Yrliet hält sich die Augen zu, schließt sie und umklammert den Seelenstein in ihrer Brust. Als die Aeldari erwacht, spricht sie eine Weile lang nicht. Mit trauriger Stimme und sorgfältig gewählten Worten erkennt sie an, dass der Elantach alles versucht hat, um ihre Verwandten zu retten ... Und doch sind es die Chem-Pan-Sey, die für den Verlust des Aeldari-Raumschiffs verantwortlich sind. In tiefer Trauer ob des Leids, das die Menschen ihrer Spezies zugefügt haben, ob des Hasses, verlässt Yrliet stumm die Brücke.
languages.original_text: Shielding her eyes, Yrliet closes them and clutches the spirit stone at her breast. Coming to, the Aeldari does not speak for a time. With notes of sadness in her voice, carefully picking her words, she concedes that the elantach did all they could to save her kin... And yet it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for the loss of the Aeldari voidship. Saddened by the pain and hatred that humans have wrought upon her kind, Yrliet quietly leaves the bridge.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet hält sich die Augen zu, schließt sie und umklammert den Seelenstein in ihrer Brust. Als die Aeldari erwacht, spricht sie eine Weile lang nicht. Mit trauriger Stimme und sorgfältig gewählten Worten erkennt sie an, dass der Elantach alles versucht hat, um ihre Verwandten zu retten ... Und doch sind es die Chem-Pan-Sey, die für den Verlust des Aeldari-Raumschiffs verantwortlich sind. In tiefer Trauer ob des Leids, das die Menschen ihrer Spezies zugefügt haben, ob des Hasses, verlässt Yrliet stumm die Brücke.

languages.text: Une main en visière sur le front, Yrliet ferme les yeux et serre la pierre-esprit contre son cœur. Passé le choc initial, l'Aeldari reste sans voix l'espace de quelques instants, puis, d'une voix triste et en choisissant ses mots avec soin, elle reconnaît que l'elantach a fait tout son possible pour sauver les siens... Pour autant, les mon-keigh sont seuls responsables de la perte du vaisseau spatial aeldari. Accablée par la douleur et par la haine que les humains vouent à son peuple, elle quitte la passerelle sans mot dire.
languages.original_text: Shielding her eyes, Yrliet closes them and clutches the spirit stone at her breast. Coming to, the Aeldari does not speak for a time. With notes of sadness in her voice, carefully picking her words, she concedes that the elantach did all they could to save her kin... And yet it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for the loss of the Aeldari voidship. Saddened by the pain and hatred that humans have wrought upon her kind, Yrliet quietly leaves the bridge.

Accablée par la douleur et par la haine que les humains vouent à son peuple, elle quitte la passerelle sans mot dire.

languages.text: Yrliet, gözlerini yumup göğsündeki ruh taşını sıkıca tutuyor. Aeldari kendine geldiğinde de bir süre ağzını bıçak açmıyor. Hüzünlü bir ses tonuyla ve söylediklerini dikkatle seçerek konuşan Yrliet, elantach'ın soydaşlarını kurtarmak için elinden geleni yaptığını kabul etse de... Aeldari uçsuz gemisinin kaybının vebali de mon-keighlerin boynuna. İnsanların türüne yaşattığı ızdırapla nefret yüzünden efkârlanan Yrliet, köprüyü sessiz sedasız terk ediyor.
languages.original_text: Shielding her eyes, Yrliet closes them and clutches the spirit stone at her breast. Coming to, the Aeldari does not speak for a time. With notes of sadness in her voice, carefully picking her words, she concedes that the elantach did all they could to save her kin... And yet it is the mon-keigh who are responsible for the loss of the Aeldari voidship. Saddened by the pain and hatred that humans have wrought upon her kind, Yrliet quietly leaves the bridge.
